targets.query:
from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu_usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "usage_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "memory_usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "mem_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: -1h)  // Adjust the time range as needed
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system_info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "uptime_hours")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 3600.0}))
  |> last()

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "eth0")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "bps")

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sensor_temperatures")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor"] == "cpu_thermal")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk_usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "disk_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu_usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "usage_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk_io_usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "read_bytes" or r._field == "write_bytes")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "bps")

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "wlan0" or r["interface"] == "eth0")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "bps")

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "memory_usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "mem_total" or r._field == "mem_used")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sensor_temperatures")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "current")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/mnt/net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk_usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "disk_used" or r["_field"] == "disk_free")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with disk_total: r.disk_free + r.disk_used }))
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "disk_free"])
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk_usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "disk_used" or r["_field"] == "disk_free")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with disk_total: r.disk_free + r.disk_used }))
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "disk_free"])
  |> yield(name: "last")
